notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected damage in the village of Chein Khar Li (Ku Lar), Koe Tan Kauk tract, Rathedaung township, Rakhine state, Myanmar. Using imagery collected on 31 August 2017, and comparing with imagery collected on 16 May 2017, UNOSAT identified 671 destroyed structures whitin the village. Analysis showed visible signs of scorching with darkened soils and burned vegetation. Almost the entire village appears destroyed. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR-UNOSAT.
